hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Market 10 Big Poes: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Forest Temple#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #Barinade#.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern MQ Iron Boots Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #a Hylian Shield#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Spirit Temple#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: Having trouble defeating Dark Link?^Look away from him while holding Z-Target and then when Dark Link walks up behind you, strafe sideways and slash your sword.
